https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/bw5wBHm3uhVNy44s3Hj4QTiqt82.jpg Broken Poet is a compelling investigation into the meaning of success, rock stardom and even freedom itself which, as Janis Joplin sang, is just another word for nothing left to lose. Broken Poet
